preflight_message.message: This will install Manufacturing Cloud Warranty Lifecycle Management Module

post_install_message.message: Thanks for installing Manufacturing Cloud Warranty Lifecycle Management Module.

error_message.message: To get help with this error, go to [help.salesforce.com](https://help.salesforce.com/), find the Support & Services area and log a technical support ticket with Salesforce. Include “PMM” in the subject line and include in your comment the installation link shown here.

You need WarrantyLifecycleMgmtPsl licenc.message: You need WarrantyLifecycleMgmtPsl licence in your Org to use this feature. Contact your Administrator.

You need WarrantyMgmtForExprcCloudPsl li.message: You need WarrantyMgmtForExprcCloudPsl licence in your Org to use this feature. Contact your Administrator.

You need ClaimsManagementFoundationPsl l.message: You need ClaimsManagementFoundationPsl license in your Org to use this feature. Contact your Administrator.

You need to enable Knowledge under Knowl.message: You need to enable Knowledge under Knowledge Settings in Setup

You need to enable Paths under Path Sett.message: You need to enable Paths under Path Settings in Setup

You need MfgServiceConsole licence in yo.message: You need MfgServiceConsole licence in your Org to use this feature. Contact your Administrator.

You need BREDesigner licence in your Org.message: You need BREDesigner licence in your Org to use this feature. Contact your Administrator.

You need DecisionExplainerPSL licence in.message: You need DecisionExplainerPSL licence in your Org to use this feature. Contact your Administrator.

You need LifeEventsAccessPSL licence in.message: You need LifeEventsAccessPSL licence in your Org to use this feature. Contact your Administrator.

You need IndustriesServiceExcellencePsl.message: You need IndustriesServiceExcellencePsl licence in your Org to use this feature. Contact your Administrator.

You need OmniStudioDesigner licence in y.message: You need OmniStudioDesigner licence in your Org to use this feature. Contact your Administrator.

You need to enable Lightning Knowledge u.message: You need to enable Lightning Knowledge under Knowledge Settings in Setup

You need to disable the Expression Set t.message: You need to disable the Expression Set to deploy the components

Assign Permission Sets to Admin User.message: Assign Permission Sets to Admin User

Deploy Settings and Expression Set Alias.message: Deploy Settings and Expression Set Alias Metadata

Add Asset Milestone Milestone Type Value.message: Add Asset Milestone Milestone Type Values

post_install_message.message: Thanks for installing data for Warranty Lifecycle Management Module.
